newsitem.title: USA: AMLI Residential enters two joint ventures.
newsitem.headline: AMLI Residential enters two joint ventures.

text.p: AMLI Residential Properties Trust said Monday it entered into two separate partnerships with a large public pension plan to jointly develop and own two communities in suburban Chicago and in Fort Worth, Texas.
The first is AMLI at Aurora Crossing, in a western Chicago suburb. The second, AMLI at Fossil Creek, is in Fort Worth and when developed will include 384 apartments.
It said the pension plan is being advised by Heitman Capital Management Corp.
AMLI said these transactions continue its strategy of co-investing with others to develop, acquire and manage multifamily communities.
